title: Effect of CB policy on cyclical UE, real income

content.question: Country H’s current domestic output is lower than its potential domestic output. Assume that the central bank now decreases its administered interest rates. What will be the short-run effects of the central bank’s action on cyclical unemployment and real income?

choices.label: Cyclical unemployment will increase, and real income will increase.
Cyclical unemployment will increase, and real income will decrease.
Cyclical unemployment will remain the same, and real income will increase.
Cyclical unemployment will remain the same, and real income will decrease.
Cyclical unemployment will decrease, and real income will increase.

content.answer: Cyclical unemployment will decrease, and real income will increase.

skill.text: Skill 3.A: Determine the outcome of an economic situation using economic concepts, principles, or models.
